URL: https://www.cnbc.com/2025/10/22/stock-market-today-live-updates.html
Title: S&P 500 rises as Wall Street tries to rebound from sell-off: Live updates
Description: Investors continue to watch earnings releases from the biggest U.S. companies, which many believe could be make-or-break for the current bull market rally.
Publish Time: 2025-10-22T22:04:25+0000
Content: ![Image 1: Futures-options traders work on the floor at the New York Stock Exchange's NYSE American in New York City, U.S., October 22, 2025. REUTERS/Brendan McDermid](https://image.cnbcfm.com/api/v1/image/108215466-17611531142025-10-22t164227z_245236270_rc22hhaxzlmq_rtrmadp_0_usa-stocks.jpeg?v=1761153139&w=1858&h=1045&vtcrop=y)

Futures-options traders work on the floor at the New York Stock Exchange’s NYSE American in New York City, U.S., October 22, 2025.

Brendan Mcdermid | Reuters

The [S&P 500](https://www.cnbc.com/quotes/.SPX/) rose on Thursday, boosted by those in the tech space, as investors attempted to regain their footing following Wednesday’s slide.

The broad market index climbed 0.2%, while the [Dow Jones Industrial Average](https://www.cnbc.com/quotes/.DJI/) traded down 56 points, or 0.1%. The [Nasdaq Composite](https://www.cnbc.com/quotes/.IXIC/) outperformed, rising 0.4%. The tech-heavy index’s rise was supported by gains in names such as [Nvidia](https://www.cnbc.com...

Given the current market conditions and individual stock performances, the portfolio appears reasonably positioned with a focus on quality technology names. No immediate rebalancing actions appear necessary based on today's price movements.
